data.name: BURST WITCH Origina Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
BURST WITCH Original Soundtrack I & II

Includes 43 original tracks in 2 disc in 320 kbps MP3 format.

Music Producer: Zoey
Composer: Zoey、王凯基GaryWang、曲扬、桂子油、十音、ReN、Moses、王乐游、钱襄\沈辑、弹跳的大球
Lyrics: 大九_LN、Zoey
Orchestration: 榕剑
Mixing: 阿烈@Soundhub、lbg、Hammer Zhu
Mastering: 阿烈@Soundhub
Recording: Chris Allen、阿烈@Soundhub、Marc Webster
Recording Cooporate: 王凯基GaryWang、Zoey、擂闪音乐
Music Cooporate: lbg
Vocal: 比哼、水一、Crystal嘉
Choir: Omnis Choir、Budapest Choir
Orchestra: Budapest Art orchestra
Trumpet: 胡丹峰、Charlie Carr、 John Hasselbeck III
Saxphone: 李世海、Adam Aronesty
Trombone: 李浩然、Andrew Watkins
Drummer: 徐之曈
Bass: Joseph、Eugene Bisdikian
Guitar: Robert Varon、Hammer Zhu
Piano: 王凯基GaryWang、Zoey
Flute: 孙思翌
Recording Studio: Sear Sound Studio, Blue on Blue Record, Soundhub Studio
